author: Nick Nairn
method: Heat the oil in a large frying pan or wok and fry the garlic and chicken, until browned all over. Add the pepper to the pan and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes. Stir in the soy sauce, mangetout and chicken stock. Continue to stir-fry over a medium-high heat for 3-4 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through. Add in the cooked noodles and stir to combine.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  1 garlic clove, chopped,  2 chicken thighs, thinly sliced,  ½ red pepper, seeds removed, thinly sliced,  1 tbsp soy sauce,  30g/1oz mangetout, green beans or sugar snap peas,  100ml/3½fl oz chicken stock,  1 nest of egg noodles, cooked according to the packet instructions
